AB_TITLE: Navigating College and Parenthood: Insights from the Fall 2021 Student Financial Wellness Survey
AB_CONTENT: Parenting students made up nearly a quarter of respondents in Trellisâ€™ Fall 2021 Student Financial Wellness Survey. These students face additional hurdles to higher education compared to their non-parenting peers and differ significantly from them in many aspects. This report takes a deeper look at the financial wellness of parenting students using national survey data.
